alert.note: Alert for Jasper; Newton; Scott; Smith (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 08 at 10:21PM CST until February 08 at 11:00PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Jasper County in east central Mississippi... Newton County in east central Mississippi... Northeastern Smith County in central Mississippi... Eastern Scott County in central Mississippi... * Until 1100 PM CST. * At 1021 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Steele to near Pineville, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Forest, Newton, Prospect, Lawrence, Decatur, Stratton, Rose Hill, Roberts, Orange, Steele, Pineville, Garlandville, Duffee, Conehatta, Little Rock, Hickory, Chunky, Lake and Montrose. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CST for central and east central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
